lyric:

[00:13.191] Late at night
[00:15.235] l'm sipping as you pass me by
[00:19.821] Red or white
[00:22.169] You pour another, say, "It's fine"
[00:26.452] I don't believe in you
[00:31.821] 'Cause I know just how you do
[00:40.633] l've seen the devil
[00:42.114] Yeah, I met him last night

[00:45.125] Yeah, I think he's all right

[00:48.447] Yeah, he's kinda my type
[00:50.692] Yeah, yeah, yeah
[00:53.255] l've seen the devil

[00:56.700] One conversation
[00:58.474] Now we're spending the night
[01:00.088] I think I love him
[01:01.803] Though I know it ain't right

[01:12.906] This the last time
